verbose_text: The viral replication and transcription activator (RTA) protein also acts as an E3 Ub ligase that ubiquitinates and degrades its own repressors, including KSHV-RTA binding protein and hairy / enhancer-of-split related with YRPW motif 1, which normally limit lytic replication.
evidence: E3 Ub ligase that ubiquitinates and degrades its own repressors, including KSHV-RTA binding protein                                   and hairy/enhancer-of-split related with YRPW motif 1
